sentences.en: Another reason, says Peter Hopkins, a geographer at Newcastle University, is that Scotland’s cultural iconography is much more vivid and more popular than England’s.
sentences.cn: 纽卡斯尔大学地理学者彼得•霍普金斯表示，另一个原因是苏格兰的文化意象相比英格兰更生动，更深入人心。
